description.value:
Shipwise: Birthed in the depths of a voidfaring craft, the void born have a natural affinity for such vehicles.

As a result, Navigation (Stellar) (Int) and Pilot (Spacecraft) (Ag) are untrained Basic Skills (instead of Advanced Skills) for void born characters.

system.benefit: Navigation (Stellar) and Pilot (Spacecraft) are treated as untrained Basic Skills instead of Advanced Skills.
system.notes: Navigation (Stellar) and Pilot (Spacecraft) become untrained Basic Skills
